name: A MOTHERGOOSE Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", find a 5-letter word for a type of bird.  HINT: It's right in her name.
questions.explanation:
Goose.

	A goose is a type of bird, and there are many types of geese all over the world.  Probably the most recognizable goose in North America is the Canada/Canadian goose.

questions.text: Using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", find a 4-letter word for an insect related to a butterfly.
questions.explanation:
Moth.

	A moth is similar to a butterfly, but is usually not near as colorful.  Moths also have fuzzier bodies than butterflies, and most moths come out at night, though butterflies come out during the day.  Both moths and butterflies start out as caterpillars, though.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning a space in a house, using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE".
questions.explanation:
Room.

	A house usually has many rooms.  A room is where a bed can be put to sleep, or where a desk can be put to make an office.  Other types of rooms in a house include the dining room, living room, family room, bathroom, and kitchen.

questions.text: Using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", find a 5-letter word for a large deer-like animal.
questions.explanation:
Moose.

	A moose is a large animal similar to a deer.  It has big antlers.  When moose is spelled like "mousse", it can be stuff put in hair or a pudding-like dessert!

questions.text: Using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", find a 4-letter word for a long tube that water comes out of to water a garden.
questions.explanation:
Hose.

	A garden hose can be many different colors, but is usually green.  It is a very long tube that allows water to go from the faucet on the side of a house to all the way to the back of a yard to water all the plants and the grass in someone's yard.  Hose can also be a type of stocking women wear on their legs.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", that means a type of flower, or to have awakened.
questions.explanation:
Rose.

	A rose is a type of flower with thorns on the stems.  Roses come in all sorts of different colors.  If you just got out of bed, you rose from bed.

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word for the parts of a plant that are underground, using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE".
questions.explanation:
Roots.

	Plants have many different parts you can see, like the stem, the leaves, and even the flower.  But what you don't see of the plant is underground, and this part of the plant is called the roots.  The roots gather water and other beneficial things for the plant from the soil.

questions.text: Using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", find a 5-letter word for a piece of fabric you put on your bed to sleep under.
questions.explanation:
Sheet.

	Sheets come in all different sizes, colors, and designs.  My sister has dark brown sheets on her bed, and they are small sheets because her bed is small.  My dad has dark red sheets on his bed, and my mom has light green sheets.  My sheets have a design of a light leopard print on them.  Sheets can also be very thin or very thick, and can help warm you up at night when you are cold.

questions.text: Using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", find a 5-letter word for the coast or a beach, by the ocean.
questions.explanation:
Shore.

	A shore is the land by a lake or an ocean.  Sometimes it is called the coast, and many times, the shore is a sandy beach where people go to enjoy themselves.

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word, using only letters in "MOTHERGOOSE", that is an animal that gallops, and looks like a large pony.
questions.explanation:
Horse.

	A horse can come in many different sizes and colors.  Horses are often used to ride on, and they are very fast.  Some horses are used in rodeos, and others are used to pull heavy things behind them.
